data.scheme_name: Scheme of State Award for Product Process Innovation - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides state award of upto Rs.5 lakhs for growth in production, innovation and development.
data.eligibility: All micro and small units located anywhere in the state are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
Units must have Udyam certificate and Haryana udyam memorandum.
The MSEs should have been in continuous production/services for last three years.
A unit selected for the award shall not be considered again for the next 5 years.
data.beneficiaries: All micro and small units located anywhere in the state are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
Units must have Udyam certificate and Haryana udyam memorandum.
The MSEs should have been in continuous production/services for last three years.
A unit selected for the award shall not be considered again for the next 5 years.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: Entrepreneurial efforts have made it possible to produce domestically which were earlier imported, The State Government recognize their efforts, new variants so produced with the help local innovations also have additional attributes not present in the original versions and are capable of solving a multitude of user problems.
data.objective: To encourage innovative efforts and promote the spirit in larger interest of qualitative development of MSEs
data.description: Scheme provides state award of upto Rs.5 lakhs for growth in production, innovation and development.
data.how_to_apply:
Applications for the MSEs Awards will be invited through an advertisement released in two leading newspapers, in addition to public notices on the notice board of District MSME Centers, and the website of the MSME Department.
The eligible Enterprises will apply in the prescribed Performa on the web portal of the department to the District MSME Centre of the concerned District.
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism:
SASC will select the awardees on the basis of merit and its decision will be final.
The Additional Director, MSME shall be competent authority for sanction of the Award prize money
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf
Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
Phone No: 8699888828
Email-id deepakbura.etd@hry.gov.in
